short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your send pyramid from Mountain Project ticks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Level up your outdoor rock climbing with the Mountain Project Send Pyramid.

Simply select the type of climb you want to see your send pyramid for (boulder, sport, or trad) and a date range. View the number of climbs you've sent for each grade, organized by send type (onsight, flash, send, redpoint, and pinkpoint).

Use this data to help set and achieve your outdoor climbing goals. To make the most out of this extension, make sure your Mountain Project ticks are accurately marked for sends.

Happy climbing!

NOTE: This extension is not affiliated with Mountain Project.
